name: L E V E L S
name_original: L E V E L S
description:
Created by UP2064568 (Ethan Munday) & UP2067269 (Charlie Roberts)

In L E V E L S, you play as an A.E.G.I (Artificial Experimental Gravitational  Intelligence) that has been sleeping for 3500 years as humanity went extinct.

You wake up and try to navigate through an abandoned science lab to try to escape without destroying your feeble body. You can shift up 4 different levels and will hover for a second before falling down. Colliding with objects above will reset gravity back to normal and moving across the ground increases gravity substantially. Can you find an escape and learn about what happened to the world (Spoilers: No)

Made using Unreal Engine 4.27.1

Assets made using Krita & Photoshop

Krita | Digital Painting. Creative Freedom.

Official Adobe Photoshop | Photo & Design Software

SFX and Music made using FamiTracker

FamiTracker
